name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2025 ーYour True Colorsー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [etiR9Qnqlmc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs a cover of 'Yuusha' by YOASOBI during her birthday celebration.
MC section where Aki greets the audience and is joined by guests Utai Meika, Dito, Nacchi, and Mukai Kouji via a call.

subtitles.original: 勇者
subtitles.english: Brave

subtitles.original: 頬を伝う涙の理由をもっと
subtitles.english: I want to know more about the reason

subtitles.original: 知りたいんだ 今更だって
subtitles.english: for the tears running down your cheeks, even now.

subtitles.original: 共に歩んだ旅路を辿れば
subtitles.english: If I trace the journey we walked together,

subtitles.original: そこに君はいなくとも
subtitles.english: even if you're not there,

subtitles.original: きっと見つけられる
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can find it.

subtitles.original: 物語は続く
subtitles.english: The story continues,

subtitles.original: 独りの旅へと立つ
subtitles.english: as I set out on a journey alone.

subtitles.original: 立ち寄る街で出会う人の記憶の中に残る君は
subtitles.english: In the memories of people I meet in the towns I visit, you remain,

subtitles.original: 相も変わらずお人好しで格好つけてばかりだね
subtitles.english: as kind-hearted and pretentious as ever.

subtitles.original: あちらこちらに作ったシンボルは勝ち取った平和の証
subtitles.english: The symbols built here and there are proof of the peace we won.

subtitles.original: それら眺めていつか私が独りにならないように
subtitles.english: So that I won't be alone when I look at them someday,

subtitles.original: あの旅を思い出せるように残された目印
subtitles.english: they are markers left behind so I can remember that journey.

subtitles.original: まるで御伽の話
subtitles.english: Like a fairy tale,

subtitles.original: 終わり迎えた証
subtitles.english: a sign that it's come to an end.

subtitles.original: 私を変えた出会い
subtitles.english: The encounter that changed me,

subtitles.original: 100年も続く旅路
subtitles.english: a journey that will last for a hundred years.

subtitles.original: 君の勇気をいつか風が攫って
subtitles.english: Someday, the wind will carry away your courage,

subtitles.original: 誰の記憶から消えてしまっても
subtitles.english: and even if it vanishes from everyone's memory,

subtitles.original: 私が未来に連れていくから
subtitles.english: I will carry it into the future.

subtitles.original: 君の手を取ったあの日全て始まった
subtitles.english: Everything started that day I took your hand.

subtitles.original: くだらなくて思わずふっと笑ってしまうような
subtitles.english: Those trivial, mundane moments that make me

subtitles.original: ありふれた時間が今も眩しい
subtitles.english: chuckle suddenly are still dazzling today.

subtitles.original: 知りたいんだ 今更だって
subtitles.english: I want to know, even now,

subtitles.original: 振り返るとそこにはいつでも
subtitles.english: because whenever I look back, you are always there,

subtitles.original: 優しく微笑みかける君がいるから
subtitles.english: smiling gently at me.

subtitles.original: 新たな旅の始まりは
subtitles.english: The start of a new journey

subtitles.original: 君が守り抜いたこの地に
subtitles.english: is here in this land that you protected,

subtitles.original: 芽吹いた命と共に
subtitles.english: together with the life that has begun to bud.

subtitles.original: はーい！見えてるみんな？アローダー！
subtitles.english: Hi! Can everyone see me? Aloda!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、色んなゲストも来てくれたりお話できたりして、めちゃくちゃ楽しいし、
subtitles.english: Today, I've had various guests come and talk to me, and it's been so much fun,

subtitles.original: 生誕祭ライブ最高！
subtitles.english: and this birthday celebration live is the best!

subtitles.original: みんなありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone!

subtitles.original: あ、なんか聞こえる。聞こえる気がする。
subtitles.english: Oh, I hear something. I think I hear something.

subtitles.original: なんか...なんだ？
subtitles.english: What... what is it?

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: え、それまさか打ち合わせ済み？それ。
subtitles.english: Wait, was that rehearsed? That.

subtitles.original: いや、心こもってるから。
subtitles.english: No, it's from the heart.

subtitles.original: 心こもってる？本当？
subtitles.english: From the heart? Really?

subtitles.original: 「せーの」で行こうって言って。
subtitles.english: We said, "Let's go on three."

subtitles.original: いや、この声は、もしかして、
subtitles.english: Wait, these voices, could it be...

subtitles.original: V最のメンバー、プレデターと一緒の、みんな！？
subtitles.english: The V-Saikyo members, everyone from Predator!?

subtitles.original: バレちまったか。
subtitles.english: You caught us.

subtitles.original: バレバレだよ！ということで、じゃあ改めて自己紹介お願いします。
subtitles.english: It was so obvious! So, let's have everyone introduce themselves again.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ディトちゃん！
subtitles.english: Okay, Dito!

subtitles.original: えーと、はい。REJECT所属のDitoと申します。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Um, yes. I'm Dito from REJECT. Nice to meet you.

subtitles.original: 次、メイカちゃん！
subtitles.english: Next, Meika!

subtitles.original: 歌衣メイカです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm Utai Meika! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: そして、ナッチさん！
subtitles.english: And, Nacchi-san!

subtitles.original: ナッチです。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: I'm Nacchi. Nice to meet you.

subtitles.original: 緊張してる？
subtitles.english: Are you nervous?

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ緊張してる。
subtitles.english: I'm super nervous.

subtitles.original: 緊張しないでー。こんなデカい舞台ね。
subtitles.english: Don't be nervous! On such a big stage.

subtitles.original: そうだよね。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: そして、向井浩二！
subtitles.english: And, Mukai Kouji!

subtitles.original: はい、向井浩二です。お願いします。おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yes, I'm Mukai Kouji. Nice to meet you. Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 時間の許す限り話すぞ。
subtitles.english: I'm going to talk as much as time allows.

subtitles.original: いや、いいよいいよ。
subtitles.english: No, go for it.

subtitles.original: このメンバーということで、プレデターと一緒のメンツを今日は
subtitles.english: Since it's this group, I reached out to the members from Predator

subtitles.original: お声がけさせていただきまして、来ていただきました。ありがとうね、みんな。
subtitles.english: to come here today. Thank you for coming, everyone.

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとうございます。呼んでいただいて。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for inviting us.

subtitles.original: 我々みたいなのが、この場に上がってもうて。
subtitles.english: People like us getting to be on this stage.

subtitles.original: 緊張しなくていいから！
subtitles.english: You don't have to be nervous!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、ナッチさ、ちっちゃいな。
subtitles.english: Wait a second, Nacchi, you're tiny.

subtitles.original: ちっちゃいね。
subtitles.english: I am small.

subtitles.original: 我々といえば、大会ありましたね。
subtitles.english: Speaking of us, there was that tournament.

subtitles.original: そうだよ。なんかでも、もう懐かしいというか、1年もまだ経ってないけどね。
subtitles.english: That's right. It feels nostalgic, even though it hasn't even been a year yet.

subtitles.original: あ、でも半年くらいか、あれも。
subtitles.english: Oh, but it's been about half a year since then.

subtitles.original: あ、そう！
subtitles.english: Oh, right!

subtitles.original: だいぶ経ってる。全然集まんねーじゃねーか俺たち。
subtitles.english: Quite a while. We haven't gathered at all, have we?

subtitles.original: そうだよ。なんであれっきりなんだ。
subtitles.english: True. Why has it been only that once?

subtitles.original: どうして。誕生日に逆に呼べて、ありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Why? Anyway, thank you for letting me invite you for my birthday.

subtitles.original: ディトちゃんとはね、ちょこちょこ同じチームになったり、イベント出たり、
subtitles.english: With Dito-chan, we've been on the same team a few times, appeared at events,

subtitles.original: コラボしたりしてるんだけど。
subtitles.english: and done collaborations.

subtitles.original: あれでしょ？こはくちゃんとやってたやつでしょ？
subtitles.english: That was the one you were doing with Kohaku-chan, right?

subtitles.original: あ、そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Oh, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: 俺見て嫉妬コメ打つか悩んでやめたもん。
subtitles.english: I watched that and debated whether to post a jealous comment.

subtitles.original: それはやってよ！「俺のこと置いていくんだ」っつって。
subtitles.english: You should've done it! Like, "You're leaving me behind!"
